Body.Content:
Coming soon: The new Microsoft Purview portal (purview.microsoft.com) has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, data governance, and risk and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you will be able to access all Purview solutions in one single portal, as well as experiences such as settings, global search, recommendations, and roles and permissions management.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 383017.

When this will happen:

General Availability (Worldwide): We will begin rolling out late July 2024 and expect to complete by mid-September 2024.

How this will affect your organization:

Before the rollout, admins need to use two portals to access data governance, data security, and risk and compliance solutions.

After this rollout

You will be automatically redirected to the new Purview portal (purview.microsoft.com) from the classic Purview compliance portal. In the new Microsoft Purview portal, you will be able to access all Purview solutions in one single portal with all existing features as well as new experiences such as centralized settings experience, global search, a new home page with tailored recommendations, and more.

You can continue to use the Compliance portal if you choose to use the toggle to return to Classic Purview. By end of 2024, we will retire the Microsoft Purview compliance portal and transition to the new Microsoft Purview portal.

The new portal will be on by default and accessible to all users with appropriate permissions:

What you need to do to prepare:

After the rollout, please expect being automatically redirected to the new Purview portal. You can still toggle off the new Purview portal and use the classic Purview compliance portal from the toggle on the top shell bar of the portal. There is nothing in particular you have to prepare at this time. Please familiarize yourself with the new Microsoft Purview portal since the classic Purview compliance portal will be retired by the end of 2024.

Learn about the Microsoft Purview portal (preview) | Microsoft Learn

This rollout will happen automatically by the specified date with no admin action required before the rollout. You may want to notify your admins about this change and update any relevant documentation as appropriate.

Details.Value: The new Microsoft Purview Portal is entering General Availability with a unified experience for data security, governance, and compliance. Rollout begins late July 2024, with completion by mid-September 2024. Users will be redirected to the new portal, which will eventually replace the classic portal by the end of 2024. No immediate action is required for preparation.

Title: Microsoft Purview: The new Microsoft Purview Portal enters GA
